shelter.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a place to live, considered as one of the basic needs of life

in/into/under etc the shelter of something

shelter.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a building where people or animals that have nowhere to live or that are in danger can stay and receive help
shelter.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: a homeless shelter (=for people who have no homes)
